generated_doNotEdit.title: Offspring
generated_doNotEdit.description: Defines the way an entity can create a born offspring.

fields.title: Blend Attributes
fields.description: If true, the entities will blend their attributes in the offspring after they breed.

fields.title: Deny Parents Variant
fields.description: Determines how likely the baby of parents with the same variant will deny that variant and take a random variant within the given range instead.

subForm.description: Determines how likely the baby of parents with the same variant will deny that variant and take a random variant within the given range instead.

fields.title: Chance
fields.description: The percentage chance of denying the parents' variant.

fields.title: Max Variant
fields.description: The inclusive maximum of the variant range.

fields.title: Min Variant
fields.description: The inclusive minimum of the variant range.

fields.title: Inherit Tamed
fields.description: If true, the babies will be automatically tamed if its parents are

fields.title: Mutation Factor
fields.description: Determines how likely the babies are to NOT inherit one of their parent's variances. Values are between 0.0 and 1.0, with a higher number meaning more likely to mutate.

subForm.description: Determines how likely the babies are to NOT inherit one of their parent's variances. Values are between 0.0 and 1.0, with a higher number meaning more likely to mutate.

fields.title: Color
fields.description: The percentage chance of the offspring getting its color as if spawned rather than inheriting color from its parents.

fields.title: Extra Variant
fields.description: The percentage chance of a mutation on the entity's extra variant type.

fields.title: Variant
fields.description: The percentage chance of a mutation on the entity's variant type.

fields.title: Offspring Pairs
fields.description: The map of entity to offspring definitions that this entity can make offspring with.

fields.title: Parent Centric Attribute Blending
fields.description: List of attributes that should benefit from parent centric attribute blending. For example, horses blend their health, movement, and jump_strength in their offspring.

fields.title: Property Inheritance
fields.description: List of Entity Properties that should be inherited from the parent entities and potentially mutated.

fields.title: Random Extra Variant Mutation Interval
fields.description: Range used to determine random extra variant.

fields.title: Random Variant Mutation Interval
fields.description: Range used to determine random variant.
